title: Indian Parliament Member Says It's Time For His Party To Reflect On Defeat
teaser: Shashi Tharoor has won reelection, but his party suffered a historic defeat. He discusses the election results and the Congress party.
contentencoded:
Shashi Tharoor is a member of India’s Parliament and its outgoing government, where he served as Minister of State for Human Resource Development.

Tharoor has won reelection, but his party, the Congress party, just suffered a historic defeat in elections.

He discusses the election results and what they mean for his party and India, with Here & Now’s Sacha Pfeiffer.
